last_episode_to_air.name: Happy Ending Romance
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jung Hyun and Tae Young try their best to figure out a way of getting Jung Woo back into the publishing industry, does their plan succeed by the end?

name: Happy Ending Romance
overview: As a result of a troubling incident in his past, Jung Woo, a gifted writer, gives up his literary dreams to begin a life of anonymity, working a number of part time jobs. Throughout his hardships, Jung Woo is aided by his closest friend, Jung Hyun, a best-selling author who seems to have it all. One day, Jung Woo suddenly finds himself being approached by one of the country's most notable publishers, an offer Jung Woo outrightly declines. However, Tae Young, the young and tenacious CEO of the publishing firm, is not the one let go easily and becomes adamant about bringing Jung Woo and his talents back to the literary world. In an instant, the fate of the three young souls become intertwined and they begin penning their own love story.

episodes.name: A man stays within a man
episodes.overview: A promising young writer, Jung Woo is made to immediately disappear from the publishing industry upon accusing an established writer on accounts of corruption. Amidst his darkest times, Jung Woo ends up finding solace in the arms of Jung Hyun, his closest friend, who decides to support him through his lowest point. Three years later, a young man by the name of Tae Young suddenly appears in search of Jung Woo.

episodes.name: No regrets
episodes.overview: As Tae Young and Jung Woo cross each other's paths, Tae Young reveals his true intent of wanting to bring Jung Woo back to the literary world, an offer Jung Woo outrightly denies. Meanwhile, Jung Hyun can't help but feel flustered upon hearing of the exchange between Jung Woo and Tae Young.

episodes.name: The Happiness That I Want
episodes.overview: Tae Young suggests that Jung Woo and Jung Hyun become co-authors, will the two writers agree to this plan?

episodes.name: The two of us walking in opposite directions
episodes.overview: A deeply shaken Jung Woo finds an assistant to help him out. At the same time, Jung Hyun also thinks of a way to help out Jung Woo.

episodes.name: The End of the Long Wait
episodes.overview: Jung Woo decides to publish a book under his own name, so Tae Young invites Jung Woo to move into his home and use it as an office.

episodes.name: Us Back Then
episodes.overview: Tae Young begins to help Jung Woo in writing as an assistant, but Jung Hyun still doesn't give up on making things right with Jung Woo.

episodes.name: The Reason Why It Has to Be You
episodes.overview: Seeing that Jung Woo is about to start a new life, Jung Hyun decides to reveal a long-kept secret.

episodes.name: Happy Ending Romance
episodes.overview: Jung Hyun and Tae Young try their best to figure out a way of getting Jung Woo back into the publishing industry, does their plan succeed by the end?
